meanings.definition: To provide with a new set of clothing or equipment.
meanings.sent1: She reoutfits her wardrobe every season to stay fashionable.
meanings.sent2: The stylist reoutfits the celebrity for the red carpet event.
meanings.sent3: After spilling coffee on her dress, she quickly reoutfits in a chic outfit.
meanings.sent4: The superhero reoutfits in a new costume to face the villain.
meanings.sent5: The makeover show reoutfits contestants to boost their confidence.

meanings.sent1: He reoutfits his car with new tires for better performance.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer reoutfits the living room with modern furniture.
meanings.sent3: The robot reoutfits itself with upgraded technology, surprising its creators.
meanings.sent4: The spy reoutfits in disguise to blend into the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The explorer reoutfits his backpack for the challenging trek ahead.
